name: Crisis At R.W.P. Inc.
description:
Hey guys,

Here's a 2 player coop game me and my team worked on for the last ten weeks. It's part of the Ubisoft 2021 Gamelab competition. This years theme was : Together / Apart. It had to be online and cooperative. Even though we already sent the game for review by a jury selected by Ubisoft, we would still like to collect feedback to improve the next games we will work on.

Both players play a different role in this game. The guard plays in first person , while the technician plays while viewing through surveillance cameras to help the guard out.

The game supports mouse and keyboard, ps4& ps5 ,xbox one (not 360) controllers.

Have fun!

Mat - Game Designer & Programmer
